name: Google - no sidebar, ads, fade; wider layout.
description:
Disables fade
removes the sidebar
removes ads
removes sponsored links
Wider description paragraph, can fit on one line
Aligned back to the left instead of being in a center column
Default font = Segoe UI
* now applies to all google domains

Basically implemented some features from a few other styles. One of them being "No Google Ads of Sponsored Links w/ Adjusted Pages" - http://userstyles.org/styles/20728
Can't remember what other styles
additional_info:
2 Oct 2011: updated to full width again after google changed something, added more comments
23 Dec 2011: Fixed it so that previews work properly. Note: works best with at least 1366x768 screen resolution
21 Mar 2012: Now runs when using https aswell
